entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 35 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 35 by morning. Wind chill minus 56 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 35. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 40 in the evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 February 2023
